attributes.title: This app is horrable.
attributes.review: What happned in 2017? A fat Cheeto became a dorito and tried. To change the presedito because the fat Cheeto didn’t like that we didn’t like the fat cheto. Anyways this app is so boring and annoying. First of all why would you make a app for a fat ugly dusty crusty rapist pedo? Second I just don’t like trump in general. This review is for trying to take down tiktok honey💕

attributes.title: Terrible Quality! Much disappoint
attributes.review:
The app is super glitchy and wanted access to my phone number which was not specified before download. Images were blurry and the app kept closing. A million ads every second. I’m surprised at the audacity Apple has to keep this app up! Very disappointed.

-an unusual fan

attributes.title: Being stalked
attributes.review: It knows your location at all times and ever since I downloaded it I’ve been getting stalked and hacked, the government has no reason for knowing your location other than to collect illegal data. Beware don’t become a victim of trump I think he is gonna sell me in to sex trafficking if I’m not careful.

attributes.title: GAVE ME BAD LUCK
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app I tripped and fell on my face. Now, I don’t go blaming apps for bad luck but this just continued. I got this app so I could salvage any part of this Cheetos good name. I went into the app and that’s where my bad luck started. A bug flew into my dear mother’s ear while I was on this app. I tripped, was kicked, and I couldn’t figure out how to do a flip! #savebarrontrump #BLM #PLEASEVOTE

attributes.title: I hate Trump
attributes.review: Trump is trying to get TikTok ban which is bad because there is over 8 million users on there and how about the people on The Who worked so long to get frame like the hype house or sway house or Charli D’Amelio and her family. People use tik tok everyday it probably one of the most used app. So if it got ban people would be mad because the love it.

attributes.title: Don’t download💅🏽🤷🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: Ok so first off, this app took like 5 years to download and I have perfectly good WiFi at my house. Second off when it did download it was glitchy and it just made my phone glitchy, and I don’t have an old phone. Why would anyone want to download this app anyways all you see is 🟠

attributes.title: Worst app, Worst president.
attributes.review: I hate this app! I downloaded it so I can find good reason to vote for him but it instead made me wish that I never did. Everything that he “plans on doing in the future” is whack! He is worrying about the future instead of the present where this country is breaking apart. I’m going to vote him out of office now.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: First time I opened the app I got a jump scare of trumps face I almost had a seizure do not recommend this app to old people. This app takes a lot of space considering it’s utility once you download it your phone start glitching and the internet goes down very disappointing app could be better but no🧡.

attributes.title: Sorry Trump
attributes.review: So my grandma lowkey hates you so she went onto Twitter and put a hate comment on a post of yours and well.... THE FBI CAME TO MY HOUSE. She was dead by the morning she really couldn’t think and had turrets so when she said F you to the fbi we knew she was done for... 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊 i Stan for spray tans tho. Also. Gen Z is going to rise you might be closing TikTok but that doesn’t mean we’ll stop attacking.

attributes.title: Worst app i’ve ever downloaded!
attributes.review: This app has given me 2 viruses AND it glitches my phone. Whenever i try to delete it, it doesn’t let me and i’m furious. Do not download this for your own safety. I keep getting messages with absolutely disgusting opinions. I can’t even bare to answer! Like i said, do not download it is really unsafe. 🤪🧚‍♀️
